name: Page Expire Popup/Redirection for WordPress
author: Vikas Ratudi

sections.description:
Welcome to the Page Expire Popup An Awesome and Urgency Page Expire Popup or Redirect for WordPress.

This will help when your page event going to expire and you don’t want to let the user select or doing any stup in you page.

If you want your url and shows your user to where they goes if the page expire.

Easy to use and easy to setup with multiple timezone setup included.

Features

  • Easy To user
  • Select any timezone
  • Popup Customization
  • Popup Button Customization
  • Hide button only
  • Clear page when expire

Notes

Page Expire Popup is absolutely free, positively the most beginner friendly WordPress page expire plugin on the market. It is both easy and powerful.

Please feel free to follow me on Instagram for latest updates: Follow.

If you have any suggestion/query just email me:) vforminfo@gmail.com.

I feel that we have done that here. I hope you enjoy using Page expire popup.

Thank you

Vikas Ratudi
sections.faq:
Who should use Page Expire Popup?

Page Expire Popup is perfect for business owners, bloggers, designers, developers, photographers, and basically everyone else who want to setup a expire page.

Can i ask for a addon feature?

Yes, Ofcourse please Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com

What should I do when I experience any problem?

Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com
